title: War of the Maelstrom
description: The Magic of the Changewinds.....could alter the shape of every man and beast in Akahlar. The Evil of The Inner Hells....could take this power away from the Storm Princess, and place it in the destructive hands of the horned demon Klittichorn. The Savagery of Ultimate War....could be the only hope for all worlds.
author: Jack L. Chalker
